storyInfo: At the end of the world, Penguin Logistics is having a pointless wine-tasting party. Everyone picks up a bottle to confront the Mafia, and the fight officially begins.

attributes.content: 10:26 PM \ Cloudy
Sunset Boulevard, 'The Ends of the Earth' lounge
Say baws, what year's this vintage?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hmm, maderized coloring, lively aroma, robust flavor, velvety texture, this is...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Last month. A forty of malt liquor from the corner store.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Perfect scores up and down, baws! That's why they call ya Lungmen's self-proclaimed number one sow-mel-eer!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: *Pfft* How many times do I gotta tell you? This is a reserve weapon. It ain't for drinking! Sora!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Okay, okay, here's your mouthwash.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Um... did ya mean to wash yer mouth with Yan huangjiu...?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Alcohol is a disinfectant. There's industrial alcohol under the bar. That would do the trick.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: S'all good. We got money so we might as well spend it. It's all in the process, y'know? Ain't the amount. It's the process of spending!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Everybody, the apple pie's ready! It's time to party!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oooh~ Exusiai's homemade apple pie!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Bottoms up!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...so like, what exactly are we partying for?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh? It's Bison's welcome party.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...so like, where's Bison?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Um! I dunno!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then pick another reason. We always got a reason to party.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...What are you guys doing?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Awright. Here's the guest of honor himself.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey. Welcome to The Ends of the Earth.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You're late. That's three shots. Guest of honor drinks triple, but you can't drink. So that's nine sodas. Drink up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Why is it called The Ends of the Earth?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (And the decor is so gaudy... And what's with the penguin... is this some kind of punk thing...?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Don't just stand there with your tongue hanging out. This is your welcome party! Apple pie?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...No thanks.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So while me and Mostima were out there fighting off mobsters, you were in here partying?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So... what happened to their leader?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He got away.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: To be more precise, we let him get away.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Regardless, he got away... so what do we do next?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We know the enemy's identity, their goal, and their numbers.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: They're the Siracusan Mafia, and they wanted to take Penguin Logistics's territory in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...even though we're a logistics firm and... never mind.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don't sweat it, Texas. We've always got a few days here and there to take out the trash.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: When ya say it like that, it makes us sound even less like a legitimate business, don't it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: They don't know what they're talking about. They couldn't fill the boss's t-shirt for two minutes without cracking under the pressure.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is a unique operation. And I'm a step even more unique.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But that means we have lots of options for how to work this out. Why do we have to fight with them?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You don't know? How have you been...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Alright, alright, let's not put too much brainpower into this. Find an opportunity to grab their boss, huck him in the river and boom, we're done.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: This whole thing has been one big ass waste of time. I just. Don't. Give. A shit.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Seriously. This isn't really worth spending any more time on. Here, gum.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Om...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But we at least need to come up with a plan to... Wait, what flavor is this gum?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: White Horse Kohl flavor.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Croissant, please add this brand of gum to our hazardous materials list.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We were runnin' low so I grabbed the new flavor. Didn't notice what it was. Oops.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yo, are we gonna party or what? We got food, we got drinks, where's the tunes?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I'm on it~!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I wasn't expecting jazz... even if it's a little...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The previous owner was something of a jazz lover, but after the boss took over we had to make a few style changes.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: A few?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's pretty much because the boss's own records all got toasted in that——
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Enough. Let's not bring back any tragic memories.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: And besides, nobody asked him to go get sick. Here I am takin' time outta my busy schedule to look after his bar.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: is it Oripathy?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Lungmen's been through a lot. They should've changed the way they look at the Infected...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Nah.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: He picked up an alcohol allergy.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: He was fixin' to be the greatest bartender in all Lungmen. Fer a feller like that, we call it terminal.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We got some party crashers. Yo, get behind the bar if you wanna live.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Nice! There's a coin back here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't squirm around, there's not much room back here——Ow! Watch your halo, Exusiai!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Stop gawking and get down, Bison.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh? Ah!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Get 'em!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Welp, that's the end of this place.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Mr. Emperor's still out there. Will he be okay?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Why are these punks still up in my business? Shoot back already, before they completely trash the joint!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sorry, boss, I'm all out of rubber bullets. Should we go at them with the barstools?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Did I not buy a forty of malt liquor and leave it here for just such an occasion?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Um, we just drank the last bottle. All we got left is the top shelf stuff.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Use it. I ain't some stuffy old rich man, filling my palaces with fancy show-off booze.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Let this liquor show us what it's worth.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Huh? But the price on this stuff's higher than——
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Grab it, hold it in your hand, and remember: aim for the head.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Protecting this bar means protecting my land. Come on.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Exusiai.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Got it! Take a bottle and smash a head. No problem!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: W- wait for me!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They're charging, watch out! Gah!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: That's a hundred thousand. Hundred and fifty thousand. Four hundred and fifty thousand. Seven hundred thousand...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: How much was that one? No! Exusiai! Not that one—— agh.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What's... huh...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Tonight's property damage bill. At least you and I got our shields to fight with. Don't want that number gettin' any bigger.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: R- right.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Okay~ Three, two, one, go!
attributes.name: Croissant
